title: Iran Agrees to Allow U.N. Atomic Agency to Reinstall Cameras at Karaj Centrifuge Production Site
sub_head: Move will avert fresh clash between U.S. and Iran over Tehran’s nuclear activities
body:
Iran has agreed to allow the United Nations atomic agency to reinstall cameras at the centrifuge production site in Karaj, ending a three-month deadlock over the issue, Iran and a senior Western official says.
The move will avert a fresh clash between the U.S. and Iran over Tehran’s nuclear activities but comes as negotiations on restoring the 2015 nuclear deal are deadlocked.
